document_name_accent: mun trung ca o tuoi day thi.json
document_title: Acne during puberty: Causes, signs, prevention
subsection_content:
Acne can appear at any age, but adolescence - puberty (from 8 to 25 years old) - is the time when most men and women have acne to varying degrees. Because this is a period when the body has many hormonal changes that cause the skin's oil glands to become more active - combined with acne-causing bacteria produced when pores are clogged, increasing the risk of acne in the skin. adolescent. (first)
Acne tends to develop strongly during puberty
subsection_title: mun trung ca o tuoi day thi.json. Why does teenage acne appear?
